RawLine: SDM_2104021902,唉，做菜煮飯真累，{color=#ff0000}還要顧著廚房，就怕別的兄弟來偷酒喝。{/color},唉，做菜煮饭真累，{color=#ff0000}还要顾着厨房，就怕别的兄弟来偷酒喝。{/color}

Items.mt: Alas, cooking is so tiring, and I still have to take care of the kitchen, I'm afraid that other brothers will come and steal the wine.
